description:
The Beginner Writer Course provides an introduction to the 5 basic literary elements needed for great storytelling. This course is intended for novice writers who want to gain a better understanding of story structure in order to improve their own writing. 

This course consists of:

  • an introduction video
  • a video explaining how to best use the course
  • 5 lectures—one for each of the literary elements: Characterization, Setting, Conflict, Plot Structure, and Theme
  • 5 brief slideshows
  • 5 worksheets to help you delve deeper into the material and get your own writing started.
  • a bonus video

This course is structured sequentially; it’s best to complete the modules in order because each concept builds upon the previous one. This course can be completed in one week—a module a day—or at your own leisure. It’s your preference. Whether you complete it in a week or in a month, you will a great foundation to begin writing your own manuscript.
title: Beginner Writer Course: Introduction to Literary Elements
